Class ApplicantMenu

java.lang.Object
views.ApplicantMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserController.PasswordChangeView
public class ApplicantMenu extends Object implements UserController.PasswordChangeView
Handles the display and input for the Applicant user interface. Implements PasswordChangeView for the password change functionality.

  • Method Details

    • displayApplicantMenu

      public int displayApplicantMenu()
      Displays the main menu for Applicants and gets their choice.
      Returns:
      The integer choice selected by the user.

    • getProjectFilters

      public Map<String,String> getProjectFilters()
      Prompts the user for project filter criteria. Uses readStringAllowEmpty.
      Returns:
      A map containing the entered filters.

    • displayProjectList

      public void displayProjectList(List<Project> projects)
      Displays a list of BTO projects in a formatted table.
      Parameters:
      projects - The list of Project objects to display.

    • getProjectSelection

      public int getProjectSelection(String prompt)
      Prompts the user to select a Project ID for a specific action.
      Parameters:
      prompt - The action being performed.
      Returns:
      The selected Project ID, or 0 if cancelled.

    • getFlatTypeSelection

      public FlatType getFlatTypeSelection(List<FlatType> availableTypes)
      Prompts the user to select a flat type from a list of available options.
      Parameters:
      availableTypes - List of FlatType enums applicable for selection based on eligibility.
      Returns:
      The selected FlatType, or null if cancelled.

    • displayApplicationResult

      public void displayApplicationResult(BTOApplication application)
      Displays the result of a BTO application attempt.
      Parameters:
      application - The BTOApplication object if successful, null otherwise.

    • displayApplicationStatus

      public void displayApplicationStatus(BTOApplication application)
      Displays the detailed status of a specific BTO application.
      Parameters:
      application - The BTOApplication object to display.

    • confirmWithdrawal

      public boolean confirmWithdrawal()
      Prompts the user to confirm application withdrawal.
      Returns:
      true if the user confirms (y), false otherwise (n).

    • displayWithdrawalResult

      public void displayWithdrawalResult(boolean success)
      Displays the result of submitting a withdrawal request.
      Parameters:
      success - true if the request was submitted, false otherwise.
